reviewText:
I enjoyed this Biography.  There is SO MUCH out there about this film star twisted this way and that, that makes the assemblence of the documented materials used a very welcome change!  The use of film clips and newsreel images is very well done.  As always the late Peter Graves lends an air of authenticity without being so fact laden to become boring.

Definitely worth owning.
Good, insightful docu, enjoyed it a lot! Seems to be based in great parts on the Natascha Rambova bio "Madam Valentino". Clarifies why their marriage didn't work out.
I really enjoyed this dvd of valentino. I just wish it had been longer. I wish there was some recording of his voice besides the 2 songs he sang in 1923.

I loved the biography about Rudolph Valentino. It was very informative and very interesting on his life and about his family and his marriages and of the movies he made.  I was very satified with the DVD and recommend this DVD for viewers to see!
